      • startServer

        public java.lang.Process startServer(java.lang.String ip,
                                     java.lang.String port,
                                     java.lang.String udid,
                                     java.lang.String chromedriverport)
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip address where you want to start appium (This will generally be 127.0.0.1
        port - the port where you want to start appium
        udid - the device id of the device you want to connect to the appium server (This device must be available and authorized in adb)
        Returns:
        returns a process object

      • startServer

        public java.lang.Process startServer(java.lang.String ip,
                                     java.lang.String port,
                                     java.lang.String udid,
                                     java.lang.String chromedriverport,
                                     java.lang.String reservationID)
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip address where you want to start appium (This will generally be 127.0.0.1
        port - the port where you want to start appium
        udid - the device id of the device you want to connect to the appium server (This device must be available and authorized in adb)
        chromedriverport - the port that you want to use for chromedriver for appium session on this device
        reservationID - the reservation ID of the active reservation for device (This is used to save logs for appium session)
        Returns:
        returns a process object

      • stopServer

        public void stopServer(java.lang.String port)
                throws AppiumNotStoppedException
        Parameters:
        port - port for the appium/selenium server that you want to stop
        Throws:
        AppiumNotStoppedException

      • checkAppiumRunning

        public boolean checkAppiumRunning(java.lang.String ip,
                                  java.lang.String port,
                                  long duration)
                           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip address that appium should be running on
        port - the port number that appium should be running on
        duration - the duration in milliseconds to wait for appium response
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

        Parameters:
        port - this listening port that should have a process attached to it (this will only find LISTENING port PIDs..not any other type of traffic)

        Throws:
